mapper.sql:
FROM ( SELECT FM_KEYNO KEYNO , FM_KEYNO , FM_REGDT , FM_REGNM , FM_WHERE_KEYS , FM_COMMENTS , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(FS_ORINM) FROM S_COMMON_FILE_SUB WHERE FS_FM_KEYNO = FM.FM_KEYNO ) FS_ORINMS FROM S_COMMON_FILE_MAIN FM ) A LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO U ON A.FM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO WHERE 1=1
AND FM_KEYNO LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND FM_WHERE_KEYS LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND FM_COMMENTS LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND FM_REGNM LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND FM_REGDT LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%'
AND ( FM_KEYNO LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%' OR FM_WHERE_KEYS LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%' OR FM_COMMENTS LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%' OR FM_REGNM LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%' OR FM_REGDT LIKE '%'||#{item.searchKeyword}||'%' )
mapper.select: SELECT U.UI_NAME FM_REGNM, FM.* FROM S_COMMON_FILE_MAIN FM LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO U ON FM.FM_REGNM = U.UI_KEYNO WHERE FM_KEYNO = #{FM_KEYNO}
